mapper.select: SELECT sum(total_price) as sales_amount, COUNT(*) as sales_count, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM-dd') as daily_chart FROM order_list WHERE 1=1 and order_status='배달 완료' and TO_CHAR(order_date, 'yy-MM-dd') between #{start_date} and #{end_date} and store_code = #{store_code} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM-dd') ORDER BY daily_chart
